mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROPERTY_FEE_INVOICE_DETAILS (INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_COMPANY, BASIC_PROPERTY_FEE, PROPERTY_FEE_INVOICE_SUM, TRIPLE_AGREEMENT, AGENCY_PAY_CREDENTIAL, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PROP_FEE_INVOICE_DETAILS_ID, PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID) VALUES (#{invoiceType}, #{invoiceCompany}, #{basicPropertyFee}, #{propertyFeeInvoiceSum}, #{tripleAgreement}, #{agencyPayCredential}, #{carteTime}, #{updateTime}, #{propFeeInvoiceDetailsId}, #{propertyFeePayDetailsId})
